msbt.message: There's no buildings around here, and that's real coolBut it means there are no landmarks to keep me from getting lost, and I am 100 percent a landmark guy.What am I supposed to do, keep track of which tree is which? Who can remember what trees look like?!<10_10 />WHERE ARE WE?!<10_9 /> Oh well. We may be lost forever, but at least the air smells pretty!
This place is so empty! Just the vast wildernessWell, not EMPTY empty. I bet there are a TON of bugs in underground bug houses!

Sometimes, after I have a really big meal, I'll come out here for, like, a stroll. It's real pretty. I just walk and walk That makes me real hungry, so sometimes I bring snacks.<10_4 /> I always bring snacks.
<10_10 />I'M YELLING! IT'S ME! I'M THE ONE YELLING!<10_9 />There're no buildings around here, ! I can practice yelling <10_10 />AS LOUD AS I WANT TO!<10_9 />
I knew I'd run into ya if I went for a walk 'round here! I saw the future! I must be psychotic! A huh huh huh!
Sniff Sniff It sure smells like ME around my house, huh?
<20_2 arg="10" />Have you gone to visit 's house?<20_3 arg="6" />It has some vibes that I can't quite explain. <10_4 />I like 'em I just can't explain 'em!
Wait What? <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="9" />You live in a tent?<10_4 /> You get to feel like you're camping every day, huh? I'm so jealous!

<20_2 arg="10" />Your house is pretty cool and small, . Like a high-tech gadget! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Or something.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I had a gadget once. I forget what it was for. Anyway, it was cool, but I lost it. Because it was small.Maybe make your house bigger so you don't lose track of it? I dunno, .
Is your house bigger than mine, ?Eh, I get lost in my house anyway. I don't need anyplace bigger!
Hey, you have two rooms in your house, right?What do you do in them? I'd use one for storing snacksand the other one for eating snacks!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your house is so big! If it gets even bigger, <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />you should let me crash there full time.I'll bring snacks and some bugs to play tag with!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your house is sobig!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />With this many rooms, you could change which room you sleep in every day! You could be all Thud I'm sleeping here today.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! A two-story house! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You must have worked really hard, !If you ever get lonely, I'm happy to use your second floor as my vacation house. A huh huh huh.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, is it true that your house has a basement?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I've heard that basements are great for keeping food in because they're cool and dark!So can I keep my snacks in your basement? You can even have some!
<20_2 arg="10" />'s house is a tent, huh?<20_3 arg="6" />I wonder if bugs come to visit at night? Well, heck, now I'm kinda jealous, .
's house is so small and cute!They're a real hard worker, so I bet their house is going to get even bigger.
<20_2 arg="10" />Check it out. This <20_2 arg="9" />is where lives!I got nothing to add to that, man. Just making conversation.
<20_2 arg="10" />'s home may look small from the outside, but it actually has two rooms!<20_3 arg="6" />I wish I had two rooms.<10_4 /> I would do so many things in that second room.So many things.
<20_2 arg="10" />'s house<20_2 arg="9" /> is so big! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe I'd have a house like this if I worked hard all day.But then I wouldn't have time to enjoy my snacks, !
<20_2 arg="10" />'s house is real big, isn't it?<20_3 arg="6" />You could fit a lotta bugs in there.

<20_2 arg="10" />Hey, didja know? That two-story house over there is 's.<20_2 arg="6" />If you had a house that big, you could use a dinosaur fossil as decoration.<20_2 arg="10" />Folks would come in your door and they'd be all, "Oh no! It's a dinosaur!"<20_2 arg="6" />And you'd be all, "Correction! It WAS a dinosaur!"<20_2 arg="10" />And they'd be all, "Are you sure?"<10_4 /> <20_2 arg="6" />And you'd be all, "Yeah. I just told you." <10_4 /><20_2 arg="10" />And they'd be all, "Oh. OK."<20_2 arg="6" />Anyway That's a real big house.
<20_2 arg="10" />Didja know that 's house has a basement?<20_3 arg="6" />I wonder what they use it for? If it was me, I'd drill holes in the walls and talk to the bugs in the dirt.

<20_2 arg="10" />At Resident Services, Timmy will buy stuff ya don't need, and sell you stuff ya do need!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I sell him stuff I don't want anymore so I can buy snacks that I do want! It's a real yummy deal!

<20_2 arg="10" />Timmy and Tommy's Nook's Cranny is smaller than a bug, but it's got a buncha stuff!<20_3 arg="6" />Plus they keep changing the stuff in there, which is cool 'cause it means more stuff for me to look at!<20_3 arg="10" />I really dig looking at stuff, .
<20_2 arg="6" />Nook's Cranny is the best. It's big and has a buncha stuff, and it smells real neat!<20_2 arg="10" />Seriously. You GOTTA go check out that smell.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Blathers is working real hard to make a great museum here on .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Sounds like he still needs things to put on display, though. Maybe we oughta help him out?
<20_2 arg="10" />Hey! Ya visiting Resident Services?Are ya gonna start doing community work?<20_3 arg="6" />I had to work once. <10_4 />It was the worst!
<20_3 arg="10" /><20_3 arg="9" />Hey, ! Whaddaya doin' here at the plane station? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You got a friend coming to visit? Are they bringing snacks?!

<20_2 arg="10" />The plaza's so neat. With other folks here, it can get rowdy! That's when I like to run around like an airplane!<20_2 arg="6" />And when nothing's happening here? I like to lay down in the middle of everything and take a nap!
The cobblestone plaza feels real fancy! And I don't usually say stuff like that about rocks!

<20_2 arg="10" />The tailors shop<20_2 arg="9" /> has so many neat things! I go say hey to everybody there all the time.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Mabel's fun to talk to about stuff. And Sable will jabber-jabber-jabber once you get her talking!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="3" />, I wonder who's gonna move into this house?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> I can't wait to be friends! A huh huh!
Look, look! Isn't it super neat that we can grow our own here?Everyone knows the best produce comes from !At least, that's what my mom told me when I sent her some in a box.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, this is really some museum! It's open 24/7, ya know.It's like a convenience store <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />but for your mind.
I like to go to the museum and look at !Sometimes we get in staring contests. I haven't won one yet!
I like to visit the museum and look at the !That room is so warm and cozy Perfect for napping Or playing tag with bug friends.
Sometimes I sit in the museum and I just stare at !I'd hate to miss it if a fossil starts moving, !

I like to visit the museum sometimes to look at !I really like art BECAUSE I don't always get it.But then I learn about the art, or the artist, and I DO get it!I really dig learning, ya know? It makes my brain feel all weird inside, !
